/usr/bin/c++ -fPIC -Wall -fno-rtti -shared  -o libMyPass.so CMakeFiles/MyPass.dir/MyPass.cpp.o   -L/home/kuow/install/llvm/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/home/kuow/install/llvm/lib /home/kuow/install/llvm/lib/libLLVMPasses.so.18.1 /home/kuow/install/llvm/lib/libLLVMIRReader.so.18.1 /home/kuow/install/llvm/lib/libLLVMCore.so.18.1 /home/kuow/install/llvm/lib/libLLVMSupport.so.18.1 -Wl,-rpath-link,/home/kuow/install/llvm/lib
